content.question: In Nadar Raising Photography to the Height of Art, Honor√© Daumier used lithography not only to reach a wide audience but also to

choices.label: demonstrate that lithography captured more detail than did photography
suggest a role for photography in documenting social issues
comment on the rising status of photography as an art form
encourage the teaching of printmaking and photography in French art academies

content.answer: comment on the rising status of photography as an art form

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
